page.title: 15RELIGION.BURY CHURCH LIFE.
page.content: BURY CHURCH NOW ONLY HAS SERVICES ON SUNDAYS.THE SERVICE IS TAKEN BY ONE OF THE WARDENS,AS THE PRIEST IS AT THE MOMENT VERY ILL,AND LASTS FOR ABOUT AN HOUR.ALSO EACH SERVICE IS DONE PREVIOUSLY BEFOREHAND.THE PEOPLE WHO GO TO THE CHURCH COME FROM BURY MAINLY.THE CHURCH HAS CLUBS FOR PRACTICALLY EVERY AGE GROUP.FOR CHILDREN AND TEENAGERS,THERE IS PATHFINDERS,BROWNIES,GUIDES AND CUBS.FOR THE ADULTS THERE IS A THURSDAY COFFEE MORNING FOR ANYONE AVAILABLE THAT TIME.THE CHURCH HAS BEEN IN BURY SINCE ABOUT THE 11 CENTURY.THE CHURCH HAS NEVER BEEN INVOLVED IN ANYTHING FAMOUS BUT ONE OF QUEEN ANNE'S CARRIAGE WHEELS WAS LOST IN TUNKER'S LANE.DURING THE WEEK BEFORE EASTER 3RD CROSSES ARE PUT ON THE HILL THAT THE CHURCH IS ON.
